author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-3330 GERONIMO-3453  Use the new plugin schema Paul came up with.  Use jaxb for geronimo-plugin xml handling.  Modify the car-maven-plugin to generate geronimo-plugin.xml and explicitly specify the dependencies for the plan in pom.xml.  This introduces several more jaxb  libraries in lib which I hope can be removed again.  Also the console plugin handling is barely working.
